data.title: Henrico Property Transactions: July 10
data.meta_description: 3719 Austin Avenue - $220,000, 830 SF (built in 1937), from Triple J Properties LLC to Santiago Morales-Diaz. 6410 Fitzhugh Avenue - $250,000, 990 SF (built in 1950), from Theresa A. Reed to Yuki D. Tu. 4160 White Orchid Lane - $289,420, 1,292 SF (built in 2024), from Mankin Properties LLC to Emily Nicole Pallis.
data.meta_site_name: The Henrico Citizen - Henrico County, Virginia's hometown news source since 2001
data.text:
3719 Austin Avenue – $220,000, 830 SF (built in 1937), from Triple J Properties LLC to Santiago Morales-Diaz.

6410 Fitzhugh Avenue – $250,000, 990 SF (built in 1950), from Theresa A. Reed to Yuki D. Tu.

4160 White Orchid Lane – $289,420, 1,292 SF (built in 2024), from Mankin Properties LLC to Emily Nicole Pallis.

5309 Golf Villa Lane – $315,000, 1,404 SF (built in 1997), from Stephen P. Yee to Kimberly Frank Fowler.

923 Scott Commons Lane – $350,000, 1,536 SF (built in 2024), from Eastwood Homes of Richmond LLC to Hasan Afzal and Sadia Rizwan.

5712 Nine Mile Road – $390,000, 2,148 SF (built in 2006), from Cassandra P. Edwards to Samuel Matthews Jr.

10803 Farmstead Mill Lane – $411,225, 1,681 SF (built in 2024), from HHHunt Homes LLC to Abhijit and Girija Jahagirdar.

7124 Village Field Place – $451,225, 2,740 SF (built in 2006), from Emilie Michele and James Lee Reid to Leslie A. Dey.

3906 Brownstone Boulevard – $492,500, 1,956 SF (built in 2012), from Jigany Carsi-Gabrenas Trustee to Nicole and Adam Bergman.

9526 Downing Street – $528,000, 2,483 SF (built in 1985), from Charles E. and K.S.M. Hegedus to Jessica Grace and Jordan Fanara.

3522 Bohannon Drive – $550,000, 2,566 SF (built in 2003), from Virgil R. Hazelett to Hanaa and Farouk El-Sabban.

5260 Old Main Street, Unit A – $599,000, 1,974 SF (built in 2022), from Randy Carl Sparks Jr. and Angela H. Sparks to Troy Wiipongwii and Aroona Boodram.

11409 Hunton Ridge Lane – $652,650, 3,384 SF (built in 2011), from Jeremy and Erica Phillips to Abebe M. Awoke and Birrye A. Tolera.

10679 Pottery Avenue – $711,941, 3,067 SF (built in 2024), from Schell Brothers Richmond LLC to Nilesh and Ronak Dave.

12004 Stable Ridge Terrace – $775,000, 2,796 SF (built in 2016), from Peter C. and Sherry R. Omiecinski to Nitin Shivhare and Shinaya Seth.

4801 Cobblestone Landing Place – $867,000, 4,282 SF (built in 2005), from Natario and Deanna F. Couser to Dev Thirwani and Megha Sharma.

316 Eglantine Circle – $940,000, 3,582 SF (built in 1998), from Yuyan D. Ding and Xijun E. Wang to William H. and Amanda M. Benson.

10823 Harvest Mill Place – $1,000,647, 3,209 SF (built in 2024), from Legault Homes LLC to Jesse Turner Crawford IV and Sharon Bui.

11 Old Bridge Lane – $1,800,000, 3,910 SF (built in 1985), from Cornelia Whittet Garrett Trustee to Ian R. and Caroline Patrick.
